entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • PowerShell running as SSH subsystem child SIGABRTs in a linux container #65232
  • Remove `% 0` workaround in `Microsoft.VisualBasic.CompilerServices` #65230
  • Improve generated code by using for-loops when using exact quantifiers with backreferences in patterns. #65229
    7.0.0
  • Ad-hoc codesign on macOS #65228
  • MissingRuntimeArtifactException on ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed.Load #65218
  • Windows Update can seemingly corrupt .NET Desktop Runtime installations sometimes #65217
  • System.ServiceModel.Syndication RSS 2.0 pubdate field,, error parsing Timezone #65212
  • [mono][workloads] Support building net-6.0 wasm workload apps in a net-7.0 sdk #65211
    7.0.0
  • [wasm] Avoid running work items for test suites that are not supported on browser #65210
    7.0.0
  • [wasm] allow the debug proxy to startup on a fixed port #65209
    7.0.0
  • Revise how VN determines whether an HWI operation needs "the base type arg" #65207
    7.0.0
  • Loop cloning driven by type tests #65206
    7.0.0
  • Building CoreCLR tests fails #65205
  • baseservices\\exceptions\\stackoverflow\\stackoverflowtester\\stackoverflowtester.cmd #65201
  • .NET 7.0 Preview 1 Microbenchmarks Performance Study Report #65200
  • `SimpleRWLock::EnterRead` shows up high in CPU usage in some cases #65199
    7.0.0
  • GC.AllocateUninitializedArray has regressed on macOS #65198
  • System.Tests.Perf_Version.Parse2 has regressed on Unix #65193
  • System.Numerics.Tests.Perf_Matrix4x4.MultiplyByScalarOperatorBenchmark has regressed #65191
  • System.Collections.IterateForEach<String>.SortedSet has regressed #65190
  • System.Numerics.Tests.Perf_VectorConvert.Convert_double_long has regressed #65189
  • System.Text.RegularExpressions performance regressions #65187
  • Interlocked.CompareExchange on enums #65184
  • Failing test system.tests.gcextendedtests.getallocatedbytesforcurrentthread #65183
  • Test failure JIT\\Methodical\\NaN\\r4NaNadd_cs_r\\r4NaNadd_cs_r.cmd #65182
  • LTTng support for Mono runtime #65181
  • Bug in System.IO Directory.GetDirectories and Directory.GetFiles methods when used with System.IO.SearchOption.AllDirectories #65180
  • [mono] Tests failing with error: Invalid IL code in (wrapper native-to-managed) System.Runtime.InteropServices.PosixSignalRegistration:HandlerRoutine (int): IL_0049: ret #65177
  • [linux][arm64] Assert failure: 'regNum >= 0 && regNum <= 30' at gcinfodecoder.cpp #65175
  • dotnet restore inconsistencies across platforms #65173
  • [tests] Runtime tests hitting System.MissingMethodException no stacktrace on Android #65171
  • Test failure JIT\\Generics\\ConstrainedCall\\vt1_il_d\\vt1_il_d.cmd #65170
  • System.Net.Security.Tests CertificateValidationRemoteServer_EndToEnd_Ok failing on Windows 7 #65168

Closed

  • Use generic math in System.Numerics.Vectors test utils #60365
    Future
  • Use static abstract interface methods in SymbolicRegexMatcher #62650
    7.0.0
  • Math/MathF.Truncate isn't an intrinsic and results in inefficient codegen #56931
    7.0.0
  • GitHub_17777 test failing on linux-arm64 #64162
    7.0.0
  • CI failure in JIT/Methodical/cctor/misc/throw_cs_do/throw_cs_do.sh #65115
    7.0.0
  • Few performance regressions in Reflection APIs #65192
  • JIT: Incorrect result computed with forward sub #65104
    7.0.0
  • compile dotnet runtime source "Microsoft.NETCore.App.Crossgen2.sfxproj" error fail. #64528
  • Weird Optimization in for loop! #65194
  • Assembly.GetType("System.Net.Http.HttpClientHandler", false, true) does not find type but finds it when ignoreCase is set to false #65013
    7.0.0
  • JIT: x*x*x*x -> (x*x)*(x*x) transformation #65141
  • atom10itemformattertests.writeto_emptyitem_serializesexpected fails in CI #57375
    7.0.0
  • DllImport from libc should support loading symbols from the global relocation table #65165

PullRequests

Created

  • Update Maui/Mobile pre.py's and disable android due to AOT Issue #65231
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Disable multiple tests failing in R2R-CG2 legs #65227
  • Convert over StandardOleMarshalObject to use either source-generated or manual interop. #65226
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, os-windows
  • Fix nullability in `IOptionsMonitor` #65225
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Options, community-contribution
  • Remove JsonConverter.RuntimeType #65224
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • [Group 3] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.FileProviders.Composite` #65223
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-FileSystem, community-contribution
  • Use StartsWith in regex compiler / source gen for shorter strings #65222
    * NO MERGE *, area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 7.0.0
  • [DRAFT] Add MonoApi runtime tests #65221
    * NO MERGE *
  • Remove not needed lines #65220
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] [wasm][debugger] Fix (chrome|edge)://inspect for the debug proxy #65219
    Servicing-consider, area-Debugger-mono, 6.0.4
  • [wasm][debugger] Fix (chrome|edge)://inspect for the debug proxy #65216
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Fix race condition in InteropSyncBlock for ComWrappers map. #65215
    Servicing-consider, area-Interop-coreclr, 6.0.x
  • Fix race condition in InteropSyncBlock for ComWrappers map. #65214
    area-Interop-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [Group 3] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Caching.Memory` #65213
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Caching
  • [Group 5] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Options.ConfigurationExtensions` #65208
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • Move Msquic over to Source-generated delegate interop. #65204
    * NO MERGE *, area-System.Net.Quic
  • Store the result in the return local in native-to-managed IL stubs. #65203
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, runtime-mono
  • Send CA names on Linux #65195
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Disable tests using external TLS1.2 server on win7 #65188
    area-System.Net
  • Improve ImmutableArray.RemoveRange #65186
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • [mono][s390x] Fix OP_FCONV_TO_I and OP_RCONV_TO_I #65185
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [IGNORE] debugging some crashes #65178
    NO REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [WIP] Heuristic change for double constant adjustment #65176
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update the ConvertToGeneratedDllImport code-fix to support stripping out PreserveSig and transforming the signature when PreserveSig was set to true #65169
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • [wasm] Add support for symbolicating wasm stack traces via XHarness #65167
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono

Merged

  • [release/6.0][wasm] Remove USE_ZLIB=1 and include the sources instead #64907
    Servicing-approved, area-Build-mono, 6.0.3
  • [release/6.0] Expand System.Runtime.InteropServices.NFloat to support the APIs required by Xamarin #64556
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [Group 3] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Options.DataAnnotations` #65202
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Options
  • Use generic math in System.Numerics.Vectors (#60365) #60905
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Use static abstract interface methods in SymbolicRegexMatcher #63546
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Use lite ciphers for CNG one shots #65151
    area-System.Security
  • Record callee saves in patchpoint info #65196
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add check for Android NDK 23 to AndroidAppBuilder #65197
    area-Build-mono
  • Respect source generator projects in slngen #65124
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Increase arm32/arm64 maximum instruction group size #65153
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Make System.Math/MathF.Truncate an intrinsic #65014
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Move test with expected crash to outerloop #65114
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Introduce `GenTreeDebugOperKind` #64498
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Adjust naming #65179
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] [mono] Remove OP_FCONV_TO_U opcode #64914
    Servicing-approved, area-Codegen-JIT-mono, 6.0.3
  • Avoid using object_gennum for objects that could come from frozen segments #65174
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [Group 2] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Options` #63767
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Options, community-contribution
  • JIT: fgMorphModToSubMulDiv should not reorder operands #65118
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add Credscan suppressions #65030
    area-Meta
  • Update StyleCopAnalyzers to 1.2.0-beta.406 #65142
    area-Meta
  • Avoid InitialTarget in libs tree for CoreLib #65146
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Subtract instead of building the cartesian product in targets #65123
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Remove GeneratedDllImportAttribute.PreserveSig #65164
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • Second round of changing null checks to !! #65108
    area-Meta
  • Add a few more regex generator malformed input tests #65159
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Fix DacEnumerableHashTable enumerator #65157
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr

Updated

  • Don't use Targets* helper properties in libs #64500
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [API Implementation]: DirectoryInfo.CopyTo / Directory.Copy #62375
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Captures support for NonBacktracking #65129
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • [API Implementation]: Use TimeSpan everywhere we use an int for seconds, milliseconds, and timeouts (Group 1/3) #64860
    area-Meta, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [API Implementation]: Extend System.Runtime.Intrinsics.X86 to support nint and nuint #63594
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Improve vectorization of String.Split #64899
    community-contribution
  • For MultiRegStoreLoc prefer allocating a local def to the same register as src #64857
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use global caching in JsonSerializerOptions #64646
    area-System.Text.Json, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • [draft][wasm] JSImport/JSExport prototype #64493
    NO REVIEW, arch-wasm, new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Clean the OpenSSL error queue more consistently #65148
    area-System.Security
  • Add support for Windows IO completions to the portable thread pool #64834
    area-System.Threading, 7.0.0
  • Improve incremental build times of the libraries subset #64000
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 7.0.0
  • [build] Move Mono API headers to src/native/monoapi #64569
    area-Build-mono
  • Add Maui performance scenarios to release6.0 runtime #65158
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [wasm][workload] Try to figure out how to support aot on net6.0 with a net7.0 sdk #61716
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [ILVerify] Reporting verification error on protected blocks with more than one handler #64582
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Remove the Unix code from `System.Drawing.Common`. #64623
    area-System.Drawing, community-contribution
  • Allow constant propagation of Vector.Zero. #65028
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Adds Range Manipulation APIs for Collection<T> and ObservableCollection<T> #65101
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [Mono] Add SIMD intrinsic for Vector64/128 comparisons #65128
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Fix Type.IsPublic for pointer and byref types #65156
    area-System.Reflection
  • Optimize Math.Round(x, MidpointRounding.AwayFromZero/ToEven) #64016
    area-System.Numerics
  • Move UnconditionalSuppressMessageAttributes from xml to .cs files for Syndication Library #65161
    area-System.ServiceModel.Syndication
  • Remove unused private parameters in SPC #63015
    area-System.Runtime
  • [API Implementation]: SafeFileHandle overloads for SetCreationTime, SetLastAccessTime, SetLastWriteTime #60507
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Remove S.R.CS.Unsafe and Intrinsify Unsafe #64861
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [WIP] Enable regions again. #64688
    * NO MERGE *, area-GC-coreclr
  • Add a test for control flow guard #65122
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Disable tests on Debug CoreClr that are already disabled on Checked CoreClr #64891
    area-Meta
  • Fix pal_assert.h when PAL_STDCPP_COMPAT defined #64631
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Keep information about CSE defs on assignment nodes #64896
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use C# 10's enhanced struct initialization features #63131
    * NO MERGE *, area-System.Linq, community-contribution
  • Fixes for CFG dispatcher on ARM64 #65127
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use SECPKG_ATTR_REMOTE_CERT_CHAIN to retrieve server cert during handshake #65134
    area-System.Net.Security
  • StreamReader sync/async optimizations: ArrayPool, IndexOfAny, ValueStringBuilder #62552
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Fix invalid behavior of MoveToAttribute methods #60556
    area-System.Xml
  • [wasm] Use `--emit-symbol-map` to generate a `dotnet.js.symbols` #65162
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [mono][wasm] Allow AOTing methods with catch/filter clauses. #64867
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Add missing GC.SuppressFinalize #64997
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • FileSystemWatcher.Linux: handle races while adding child directories. #64906
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • update SSL tests to deal better with disabled protocols #65120
    area-System.Net.Security, test enhancement
  • Fix nullability warnings for NativeAOT CoreLib #65137
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • FileSystem: MoveDirectory: some improvements. #65132
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Implement NativeLibrary.GetEntryPointModuleHandle #57610
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • [tests][mobile] Enable diagnostic_tracing for iOS runtime tests #64952

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-11
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • [NativeAOT] Delegate Method Data Error #1853

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] ilc assertion failed when compiling ImageSharp #1851
  • How to automate nativeaot compiler targeted for x64 using 32bit vs command prompt #1766

PullRequests

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Add support for GT_STORE_OBJ and GT_OBJ #1825

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Package Validation] Explore a better way to examine the package for better performance #23896
    7.0.1xx
  • Set process priority to use efficiency cores. #23894
  • [Package Validation] investigate performance impact to the developer innerloop when creating a package #23893
    7.0.1xx

PullRequests

Created

  • Add docs for workloads #23895
  • Fix cli translation issue in Strings.zh-Hans.xlf #23882
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update the hardcoded net5.0 to the current framework #23881
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Merging internal commits for release/5.0.2xx #23822
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merging internal commits for release/5.0.4xx #23823
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Enable additional test projects to run on helix #23381
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1608366 #23858
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0.2xx #23832
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'main' #23862
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Block loading the 7.0.100 SDK in 16.11 and below VS and MSBuild versions #23302
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Champion: Simplified parameter null validation code #2145
    Working Set
  • [Proposal] Required Properties #3630

  • [Proposal]: Collection literals #5354

  • [Proposal]: Adding Index support to existing library types (redux) #5596

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Fix pipeline run title in Roslyn PR Validation #59501
  • Copying and pasting a variable matching an already imported type name will add another using if there's another type with that name #59499
  • Compiler should provide a better error message for generic type constraint 'enum' #59495
  • Keyword completion for top-level statements is showing up in C#8 #59489
  • Event handler tab-completion does not work in new project templates #59488
  • Incremental source generator not called in production build context #59487
  • Variables in list, recursive and var patterns are not colorized as local #59484
  • Move static members to another type is suggested for top-level statements #59470

Closed

  • Semantic classification and other features fail in VS for no apparent reason #59506
  • "Add parameters to constructor" context action should maintain constructor parameter wrapping #49040
    Backlog
  • IDE0028 breaks working code #47632
    17.2
  • #endif is seen as LeadingTrivia of namespace instead of TrailingTrivia of using statement #59496
  • List patterns: x is [..var y] with a custom collection type causes a crash #59466
  • CS8604 false positive 'possible null reference argument' when null is excluded in a query. #59172
  • Test plan for "checked operators" #59196
    17.2
  • `Invert If` analyzer should be aware of Is / IsNot complementation. #51359
  • 'Add parameter' should respect wrapping of existing parameters. #58040
    17.2
  • new() not respecting nullable struct #57777
    17.2
  • "IDE0090: 'new' expression can be simplified" changes the behavior for Nullable<T> #54081
    17.2
  • IDE0090 incorrectly suggested for `new` expression #50735
    Backlog
  • Wrap Properties is unavailable in recoverable syntax failure conditions #38986
    Backlog
  • Move to block body refactoring dropping trivia #53532
    17.2
  • Wrap array initializer expressions. #37428
    Backlog
  • IDE0057 Substring can be simplified - Should not apply in expression trees #49347
    Backlog
  • Error in VB code for code style sample for prefer System.HashCode #49678
    Backlog
  • [Flaky Test] Roslyn.VisualStudio.IntegrationTests.CSharp.CSharpCodeActions.GenerateMethodInClosedFile times out #57722
    17.1
  • Typo in DocumentPullDiagonsticHandlerProvider file name and class name #57319
    17.2
  • Use 'is null' check is suggesting 'is object' instead of 'is null' #58483
    17.2
  • Static constructors in interfaces miss the syntax highlighting #55313
    17.2
  • Code Fix Error in Visual Studio #53574
    Backlog
  • Incorrect namespace in Features core layer #49239
    Backlog
  • Refactoring to implement explicitly an interface should remove default parameter values #52020
    Backlog
  • NRE in DeclarationNameCompletionProvider.ProvideCompletionsAsync #59463
  • Show pattern formats in intellisense for DateTime.ToString #17011
    Backlog
  • I am unable to convert a DateTime.Now variable ToString("H") #49471
    Backlog
  • Test failure in Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp.Emit.UnitTests.dll #57560
    17.2
  • BackgroundAnalysisScope enhancements #57146
    17.2
  • Flaky test: TupleWithElementNamedWithDefaultName #52658
    17.2
  • IDE0055 in target-typed new with collection initializers #58157
    17.2
  • Go to Symbol does not work for record fields #57873
    17.2
  • [Flaky Test] VisualBasic.BasicAddMissingReference.InvokeSomeFixesInVisualBasicThenVerifyReferences #57980
    17.1
  • Flaky test: Roslyn.VisualStudio.IntegrationTests.CSharp.CSharpCodeActions.FastDoubleInvoke #57551

PullRequests

Created

  • More options refactoring #59508
    Area-IDE
  • Remove obsolete internal API #59507
    Area-IDE
  • NavigationOptions refactoring #59505
    Area-IDE
  • Support parsing of checked user-defined operator declarations #59504
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - CheckedUserDefinedOperators
  • Use segmented arrays for VirtualChar storage #59503
    Area-IDE
  • Only subscribe to ActiveDocumentChanged if solution cralwer is enabled #59498
    Area-IDE
  • Update Language Feature Status for pattern matching on ReadOnlySpan<char> #59497
    Area-Compilers
  • Revert "BackgroundAnalysisScope enhancements" #59492
    Area-IDE
  • Detect ref assemblies in rebuild #59491
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Support extended property patterns in 'use recursive' refactoring #59490
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Add telemetry to log analyzer execution times during background analysis #59480
    Area-IDE, 17.2
  • List-patterns: report error when no suitable length member #59475
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - List Patterns
  • Value Tracking: Remove inproc symbol usage #59473
    Area-IDE
  • Main attributes for simple programs #59471
    Area-Compilers

Merged

  • Implement Initializer expression wrappers #39878
    Area-IDE, Feature Request, Community, Next
  • Add a few asserts/throws to our CodeModel implementation #59500
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.1-vs-deps to release/dev17.2 #59493
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Let Import Completion check for global usings auto-generated by SDK #59360
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Inverting TypeOf should support 'TypeOf x IsNot...' #59460
    Area-IDE, Next
  • List-patterns: list-patterns may be always-true #59478
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - List Patterns, Next
  • Fix test plan link for checked operators #59494
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.1 to release/dev17.1-vs-deps #59485
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Fix a few issues with use object/collection initializer. #59479
    Area-IDE, Next
  • 'Add selected parameters to constructor' should respect existing user formatting #59432
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Fix build break caused by different merged PRs conflicting #59483
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.1 to release/dev17.1-vs-deps #59482
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.0-vs-deps to release/dev17.1 #59481
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Change json detection from a suggestion to a refactoring #59422
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Do not offer 'use index/range' in an expression tree #59477
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Include record primary constructor props in nav-to when not backed by a corresponding field/prop. #59437
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Suppress formatting with implicit object initializers #59430
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Improve 'use pattern matching' to use `is null` instead of `is not object` #59464
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Do not use implicit object creation on nullable struct types #59438
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Support wrapping constructs even in the presence of some recoverable errors #59385
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Remove integration tests that are already ported to the new project #59457
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Improve trivia handling in use-block body. #59448
    Area-IDE, Next
  • FIx vb example text #59476
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Fxi mispeeling #59440
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Fix the titles we show the user for the 'use is null' fixers #59409
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Classify interface static constructors #59442
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Do not use 'var' when fixing the return type of method #59447
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.0-vs-deps to release/dev17.1 #59461
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Generate proper explicit interface impls #59459
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Add IL verification with ILVerify in addition to PEVerify #37994
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Batch file notifications and acquire locks asynchronously #59441
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Revert "Move workspace file removal to BG to avoid UI delay" #59472
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Remove dependency on EditorFeatures from Remote.ServieHub project - take 3 #59316
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Upgrade to Microsoft.VisualStudio.Telemetry 16.4.29 #59426
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • BackgroundAnalysisScope enhancements #57172
    Area-Analyzers, Needs UX Triage, Next
  • Avoid race condition in map for TupleElementIndex #58500
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Tuples, Next
  • Ide analyzer options #58765
    Area-IDE, Needs UX Triage, Next
  • Move option to right category #59425
    Area-IDE, UX Review Not Required, Next
  • Move cancellation catch up out of the navigate to searcher #59439
    Area-IDE, LSP, Next
  • Avoid directly exposing temporary storage streams #59431
    Area-IDE, Next

Updated

  • Merge release/dev17.2 to main #59509
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/rename_ui_rework #59400
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Support live diagnostics in source generated files #58363
    Area-IDE, UX Review Not Required
  • Support declaring and binding to methods with `params Span<T>` #59123
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix "Add Constructor Parameter From Members" for partial classes #59450
    Area-IDE
  • Don't block completion for items from unimported namespaces #59045
    Area-IDE
  • EditorFeatures.Cocoa: Build with net6.0-macos #59429
    Area-Infrastructure
  • add all analyzers that are configured via editorconfig to code cleanup #59106
    Area-IDE

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Allow customizing the cookie consent value #40164
  • Subscribe to Blazor Web Assembly AuthenticationStateChange Event #40163
  • IWebHostENvironment returns incorrect path when deployed to server #40162
  • Add support for `-minimal` option for F# ASP.NET Core templates #40161
  • LogLevel Warning is somewhat verbose for UserManager #40160
    Backlog
  • Investigate Watson reported compiler crashing issues in Razor #40159
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Referencing incompatible dependency in a Blazor WebAssembly project will result in an unhelpful error #40157
    .NET 7 Planning
  • VS 2022: Default Angular and React web apps do not start #40155
  • Hot reload fails when running the blazor wasm hosted app in without debugging mode #40154
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Razor view CSS isolation does not support HTML header tag #40151
  • Support localization for endpoint attributes #40150
    .NET 7 Planning
  • [Blazor] Add support for confirming navigations #40149
  • Is there something like IIS recycling periodically for Kestrel server on Linux? #40147
  • Blazor WASM Environnement issue #40146
  • AspNetCore.DataProtection `ProtectKeysWithCertificate` rotation mechanism #40145
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Blazor & Custom Certificates #40144
  • MarkupString not working and encode character & #40141
  • Blazor Wasm: Antivirus rejects files written to cache, despite DLL bundling #40139
  • SignalR ESM Bundling fails due to syntax error in HubConnection.js (fix included) #40137
  • Generate Minimal API from OpenAPI file #40135

Closed

  • ConfirmEmail.cshtml returnUrl not working #40032
  • Turn HRs into error messages when logging to event log #3792
    Backlog
  • Improve usability of our deployer framework #5917
    Backlog
  • Add logging for Polly integration and Policies #28386
    Backlog
  • Review "non-strict" test cases #2475
    Backlog
  • Autobahn-0.5.0 client failure #2473
    Backlog
  • Unit tests fail if ASPNETCORE_ENVIRONMENT environment variable is set #5901
    Backlog
  • Missing dispose in security area #40017
  • ASP.NET Core 6 with Scaffolding in linux #38640
  • Razor: Duplicate ids generated by INPUT tag helpers #40156
  • 'dotnet watch run' not loading static styles in the wwwroot of a razor class library #40116
  • Hot reload using dotnet watch doesn't work 98% of the time #40091
  • Allow handling of malformed HTTP Requests by supplying custom HttpParser #38829
    Discussions
  • Does not contain a public invokable method #40110
  • 'atob' on Window error on .NET 6.0 #40113
  • Perf improvement: json_actix #40111
  • Perf improvement: mvc #40126
  • All the strings.json files can be removed #40107
    7.0-preview2
  • Disable BlazorTemplates.Tests from running in quarantined pipelines #40051
    7.0-preview2

PullRequests

Created

  • Improve IIS tests #40166
  • Add analyzer to detect async void usage #40165
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Add back strings.json for WebApi-CSharp #40153
    area-mvc
  • Make InputRadioGroup preserve child elements #40148
    area-blazor
  • [Blazor] Compiler runtime APIs needed for bind:get, bind:set, bind:after #40143
    area-blazor
  • RenderTreeDiffBuilder – components after components with @key are oft… #40142
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • Add catch parentheses #40138
    area-signalr, community-contribution
  • Do less copying / zipping for Helix #40134
    area-infrastructure

Merged

  • Address some infrastructure nits #40133
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview2
  • Add release/6.0 PR validation for quarantined-pr #40130
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview2
  • Add ReaderThrowsResetExceptionOnInvalidBody to retry #40152
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview2
  • [release/6.0] Extend disable component governance for linux #40158
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.3
  • Port https://github.com/dotnet/aspnetcore/pull/38814 to 6.0 #40101
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.x
  • Bump karma from 6.3.4 to 6.3.14 in /src/SignalR/clients/ts/FunctionalTests #40136
    area-signalr, javascript, feature-blazor-native-dependencies, 7.0-preview2
  • Delete ProjectTemplates `strings.json` #40128
    7.0-preview2
  • Skip Playwright Tests Running in Quarantined Pipeline #40129
    area-mvc, playwright 🎭, 7.0-preview2

Updated

  • [WIP] libnethost prototyping #39810
    area-runtime
  • Allowing empty FromBody parameters input based on nullability #39917
    breaking-change, area-mvc
  • Remove SocketException usage #38094

  • Support OpenAPI summaries and descriptions on minimal endpoints #40088

entry.content:
Issues

Created

Closed

  • Default Maui projects giving various errors. It did work 4 days ago before the last update #3652

Created

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • dbcontext scaffold parameter "-use-database-name" still changes generated entity class names #27430

Closed

  • Pooled DbContext doesn't close underlying connection - regression from .NET 5 #27399
  • Could not copy error with dotnet ef migrations bundle #27393
  • EF Framework Tools try to build with old SDK #27385
  • Exception creating migration to Drop a table #27418
  • Required reference with a nullable FK doesn't throw errors in sqlite and returns null for containing objects in queries #27411
  • How to separate entity's primary key from base class? #27421
  • How to map private/protected properties as well? #27400
  • Query causes InvalidOperationException when creating an anonymous type #27371
  • Is it by design for In-Memory provider that BeingTransactionAsync returns value, but Database.CurrentTransaction stays null? #27420
  • Small refactoring in DbContextFactorySource<TContext>.CreateActivator static method | Reduce condition nesting #27339

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/6.0] Fix to #27356 - Collection_navigation_equal_to_null_for_subquery fails after merging from release/6.0 #27429
    Servicing-consider, 6.0.x

Updated

  • [release/6.0] Temporal table support for owned and table splitting scenarios #27380
    Servicing-more-info, 6.0.x
  • Bump Microsoft.Azure.Cosmos from 3.23.0 to 3.24.0 #27394
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
